EffectEvidenceSynthesis.description: A quantified estimate of effect based on a body of evidence

approvalDate.description: When the effect evidence synthesis was approved by publisher

author.description: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

contact.description: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

description.description: Natural language description of the effect evidence synthesis

editor.description: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

effectivePeriod.description: When the effect evidence synthesis is expected to be used

exposure.description: A reference to a EvidenceVariable resource that defines the exposure for the research.

exposureAlternative.description: A reference to a EvidenceVariable resource that defines the comparison exposure for the research.

identifier.description: Additional identifier for the effect evidence synthesis

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

jurisdiction.description: A legal or geographic region in which the effect evidence synthesis is intended to be used.

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

lastReviewDate.description: When the effect evidence synthesis was last reviewed

name.description: Name for this effect evidence synthesis (computer friendly)

note.description: A human-readable string to clarify or explain concepts about the resource.

outcome.description: A reference to a EvidenceVariable resomece that defines the outcome for the research.

population.description: A reference to a EvidenceVariable resource that defines the population for the research.

publisher.description: The name of the organization or individual that published the effect evidence synthesis.

relatedArtifact.description: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

reviewer.description: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

status.description: The status of this effect evidence synthesis. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

studyType.description: Type of study eg randomized trial.

text.description: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

title.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the effect evidence synthesis.

topic.description: The category of the EffectEvidenceSynthesis, such as Education, Treatment, Assessment, etc.

url.description: Canonical identifier for this effect evidence synthesis, represented as a URI (globally unique)

useContext.description: The context that the content is intended to support

version.description: Business version of the effect evidence synthesis

certaintySubcomponent.description: A component that contributes to the overall certainty

author[x].description: The individual responsible for making the annotation.

text.description: The text of the annotation in markdown format.

time.description: Indicates when this particular annotation was made.

display.description: Brief description of the related artifact

resource.description: The related resource, such as a library, value set, profile, or other knowledge resource.

type.description: The type of relationship to the related artifact.

url.description: A url for the artifact that can be followed to access the actual content.

div.description: The actual narrative content, a stripped down version of XHTML.

code.description: A code that identifies the type of context being specified by this usage context.
Symbol in syntax defined by the system

display.description: A representation of the meaning of the code in the system, following the rules of the system.

system.description: The identification of the code system that defines the meaning of the symbol in the code.

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user

version.description: Version of the system - if relevant
